name: Abiding Choice INC
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Abiding Choice INC is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Rockdale, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $24.3M in Medicaid payments across 190K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $24.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
